alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Denton; Tarrant (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 20 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Denton, northeastern Tarrant and northwestern Dallas Counties through 845 PM CDT... At 815 PM CDT, the public reported a strong thunderstorm over Grapevine, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dallas, Plano, Irving, Grand Prairie, Carrollton, Frisco, Richardson, Lewisville, Flower Mound, Euless, Bedford, Grapevine, Coppell, The Colony, Farmers Branch, Southlake, Colleyville, Addison, Hackberry and Hebron. This includes Interstate 35E between mile markers 437 and 452. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
